## ProofNode.(constructor)

Creates an instance of ProofNode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(hash?: Hash, children?: Hash[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hash | Hash | _(Optional)_ current node hash |
|  children | Hash\[\] | _(Optional)_ children of the node |
